Package io

package io
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    EnigmaLoader
    Class responsible for loading Enigma instances from an JSON file.
    GameExporter
    Responsible for exporting a GameReport to a JSON file.
    GameReport
    Represents the summary of GameReport
    GameReport.EnigmaEvent
    Represents a single enigma interaction for a player: the room where it occurred, the question, the answer, whether it was solved and the effect applied.
    GameReport.PlayerReport
    Class that stores all information about a single player in a game.
    GameReportLoader
     
    MapExporter
    Class responsible for exporting a LabyrinthGraph to a JSON file.
    MapGenerator
    Class responsible for generating the labyrinth maps
    MapLoader
    Utility class responsible for loading a labyrinth map from a JSON file
